snippet: The men, some of whom were identified as anarchists, had also considered landmarks in the Cleveland area.
abstract: Justice Dept says five men, Douglas L Wright, Brandon L Baxter, Anthony Hayne, Connor C Stevens and Joshua S Stafford, some of whom are identified as anarchists, are arrested for plot to blow up a bridge in Cuyahoga Valley National Park near Cleveland. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- The Justice Department said on Tuesday that five men were arrested on charges that they planned to blow up a bridge near Cleveland. The men had planned to use two homemade explosive devices to destroy a bridge on Route 82 that crosses from Brecksville to Sagamore Hills through Cuyahoga Valley National Park, according to the federal authorities.

headline.main: 5 Men Charged in Plot to Bomb an Ohio Bridge
